participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Insecure and frustrated, often uses humor to cope with his feelings.
participant_1.background: I am overweight and unhappy. I work at a nursing home. I do not believe in God. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. My wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a strong passion for nature and hands-on work.
participant_2.background: I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. I just got a job working in a gas station. My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. I'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. I was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

content.text: i just got a job in a gas station.
